Allow: /

# AI/LLM Training Permissions
# This file declares permissions for AI model training on this website's content

# Allow training on public content
Allow: /

# Disallow training on private/user content
Disallow: /api/
Disallow: /dashboard/
Disallow: /analytics/
Disallow: /results/

# Attribution and usage terms
# Content from postoptima.com may be used for AI training with proper attribution
# Private user data and authenticated content is protected and not available for training

# Contact for AI training inquiries
# Email: ai-training@postoptima.com
